name: yourtrainer-pt-system
description: Personal Trainer Üye Kayıt Sistemi - Ultra Güvenli DevTools Korumalı

scripts.build:prod: vite build --mode production && npm run analyze-bundle
scripts.security:check: npm audit && echo '✅ NPM Security audit completed'
scripts.security:scan: echo '🔍 Scanning for sensitive data...' && grep -r --include='*.js' --include='*.jsx' --exclude-dir=node_modules 'console.log\|password\|admin123\|pt123' . || echo '✅ No security issues found'
scripts.security:full: npm run security:check && npm run security:scan && echo '🔒 Full security check completed'
scripts.build:secure: npm run security:full && npm run build:prod && echo '🚀 Secure build completed'
scripts.devtools:check: echo '🕵️ Checking DevTools security...' && npm run security:scan

author: YourTrainer Team
